rComments: Eli is an incredibly caring professor. However, those who do not put any effort into the class will do poorly. Get to know him, go to office hours, and talk to him about the final project and you will get an A. He is incredibly well respected and has helped me advance my career in the earth sciences through his connections.

Eli is a really nice guy. This class is kind of boring but I have found it really useful and applicable while working at jobs in the field. Also, eli is really helpful if you go ask him about opportunities in the field, he helped me get a sick internship.

Good skill building class. Fair grading style that incorporates different types of learners. Open note quizzes each week, labs each week, 1 midterm, and a final project with a paper. Eli makes himself very available for answering questions and is a nice guy.

Overall an easy class, gives open note quizzes weekly, however the lectures can be very very boring at times, lectures on topics that don?t seem to pertain the to course material, an overall knowledgeable good guy, the labs are horribly long and tedious and the TA?s were of little help.
